itemDescription: minister of the Presbyterian Church in Ireland and journalist

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Croskery D.D. (1830–1886) was an Irish theologian and reviewer.

response: *Ephesians. Exposition and homiletics by Rev. Professor W. G. Blaikie ... Homilies by various authors, etc. (Pulpit... by William Garden Blaikie, Thomas Croskery and David Thomas  (1886)
* Life of Rev. A. P. Goudy, D.D., begun by Thomas Croskery, 1887.
